| name = Dicyemidae image = Dicyema macrocephalum.png image_caption = [[Dicyema
| macrocephalum]] regnum = Animalia phylum = Rhombozoa classis = ordo = subordo
| = familia = 'Dicyemidae' subdivision_ranks = Genera subdivision=
see text }}

'Dicyemidae' is a family of tiny parasites that live in the renal appendages of
cephalopods. It contains the following genera and
species: http://www.marinespecies.org/aphia.php?p=taxdetails&id=14222
* [[Dicyema]] von Kolliker, 1849 ** [[Dicyema acciaccatum]]

  1949 ** [[Dicyema acuticephalum]] Nouvel, 1947 **

  akashiense]] Furuya, 2005 ** [[Dicyema apalachiensis]]
  Short, 1962 ** [[Dicyema apollyoni]] Nouvel,
  1947 ** [[Dicyema australis]] Penchaszadeh, 1969 **
